snippet: Russian security forces in a restive North Caucasus province on Sunday killed three militants who were suspected of planning attacks on church services during the Russian Orthodox Christmas.
abstract: Russian security forces in restive North Caucasus province kill three militants who were suspected of planning attacks on church services during Russian Orthodox Christmas.
lead_paragraph: Russian security forces in a restive North Caucasus province on Sunday killed three militants who were suspected of planning attacks on church services during the Russian Orthodox Christmas.
